text: What was your first attempt at a project, as a newbie?
I started on a password database (think KeePass) in Pascal when I was 13.
I was so busy with making a functional text user interface (similar to Borland Pascal 7.0), that I didn't get to encrypting the password file.
I was just replacing each character in a CSV (not really knowing it was called that) with its ASCII value.
Needless to say, I long lost interest and the source code.
